skins.shipDescription: Fletcher-class destroyer - Stanly , Hull Number DD-478.
skins.selfIntroduction: In the past, I've escorted many of my allies, and served in the Battle of Empress Augusta Bay as a member of the Little Beaver Squadron. As long as I'm in my serious mode, I'm really reliable in both day and night battles.
skins.acquisition: Good morning, Commander. I'm Stanly, a destroyer from the Eagle Union. I will follow your every order to bring you victory... Pffft! Bahaha! S-Sorry, this whole "serious introduction" thing totally cramps my style, haha!
skins.login: Stanly has entered work mode! By the way, it doesn't last very long.
skins.details: What are you staring at? I'm not going to transform...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, join me in becoming a hero of justice... Bahaha! Just kidding!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, are you still in work mode? Jeez, don't keep me waiting much longer...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, your hair sure is funny! Let's give it a good twirl~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Self-defense mode activating... Bahaha, you should've seen your face!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Sorry to disappoint, but I don't have a hot and bothered mode.
